DOC.brief_summary: A cluster , randomize , control clinical trial , hypothesis Group GDS Individual GDS effective treatment nonspecific low back pain . The cluster participate physiotherapy department primary care treat patient low back pain . In physiotherapy department 3 group : education group , Group GDS Individual GDS . Patients follow 12 month . Variables : demographic , intensity pain , disability , quality life , patient satisfaction , medication intake current episode , non-pharmacologic treatment current episode , co-morbidity , diagnostic test , sick leave , habitual physical activity . The questionnaire use : Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire , PI-NRS , VAS , SF-12 EQ-5d .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Group GDS Individual GDS Treatment Low Back Pain Primary Care
